PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-09172024-07-24PMO
ActNational Security and Intelligence Review Agency Act
PrecisReappointment of HONOURABLE MARIE DESCHAMPS, C.C., of Montréal, Quebec, as a member of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency; and his designation as Chair of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective September 5, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of HONOURABLE MARIE DESCHAMPS, C.C., of Montréal, Quebec, as a member of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency; and his designation as Chair of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective September 5, 2024.
